languages.text: "Ярость бурлила во мне и нашла выход через смерть. Я не отыскала сил, чтобы прокричать правду в лицо миру. Но Вольный Торговец простил{mf||а} мое малодушие".
"Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."
languages.original_text: "Ярость бурлила во мне и нашла выход через смерть. Я не отыскала сил, чтобы прокричать правду в лицо миру. Но Вольный Торговец простил{mf||а} мое малодушие".

traits.locale_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

traits.locale_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “愤怒曾在我心中肆虐，在死亡中得到发泄。我曾软弱无力，不敢向这个世界大声说出真相，但行商浪人原谅了我的懦弱。”
languages.original_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

traits.locale_text: “愤怒曾在我心中肆虐，在死亡中得到发泄。我曾软弱无力，不敢向这个世界大声说出真相，但行商浪人原谅了我的懦弱。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « J'étais consumée par une fureur dont seule sa mort pouvait me libérer, mais je n'ai pas eu la force d'avouer la vérité. Heureusement, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} m'a pardonné ma couardise. »
languages.original_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

traits.locale_text: « J'étais consumée par une fureur dont seule sa mort pouvait me libérer, mais je n'ai pas eu la force d'avouer la vérité. Heureusement, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} m'a pardonné ma couardise. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La furia ardía en mi interior y encontró su salida en la muerte. No tenía fuerzas para proclamar la verdad al mundo. Pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha perdonado mi cobardía».
languages.original_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

traits.locale_text: «La furia ardía en mi interior y encontró su salida en la muerte. No tenía fuerzas para proclamar la verdad al mundo. Pero {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ha perdonado mi cobardía».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「私の中で怒りが煮えたぎり、その怒りが死からの出口を見つけたのだ。この星の真実を大声で叫ぶ力は私にない。しかし自由開拓者ならこの臆病も許してくださる」
languages.original_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

traits.locale_text: 「私の中で怒りが煮えたぎり、その怒りが死からの出口を見つけたのだ。この星の真実を大声で叫ぶ力は私にない。しかし自由開拓者ならこの臆病も許してくださる」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Zorn tobte in mir und fand ein Ventil im Tod. Ich konnte nicht die Kraft aufbringen, die Wahrheit in die Welt zu schreien. Doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat mir meine Feigheit vergeben."
languages.original_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

traits.locale_text: "Zorn tobte in mir und fand ein Ventil im Tod. Ich konnte nicht die Kraft aufbringen, die Wahrheit in die Welt zu schreien. Doch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} hat mir meine Feigheit vergeben."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

languages.text: "Beni yalnızca ölümün arındırabileceği bir öfkenin esiriydim. Hakikati dünyaya duyuracak cesareti kendimde bulamadım. Fakat Hür Tacir, korkaklığımı affetti."
languages.original_text: "Fury raged within me and found an outlet in death. I could not find the strength to cry out the truth to the world. But the Rogue Trader has forgiven my cowardice."

traits.locale_text: "İçimde öfke alevleniyordu ve ölümle bir çıkış yolu buldu. Hakikati dünyaya duyuracak cesareti kendimde bulamadım. Fakat Hür Tacir, korkaklığımı affetti."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
